name: CactusCowboy
description:
Controls:

[ W ],  [ A ],  [ S ],  [ D ]Walk[ Mouse ]Aim
[ Mouse-Left ]Shoot[ Mouse-Right],  [Space],  [ Left-Shift],  [Q]Dodge and Reload

Cactus Cowboy is a small top-down-shooter. You have to fight against evil enemies, collect powerful upgrades and fight a terrifying boss. Can you survive the most waves of enemies and reach the highest score?

I developed this game in my free time during the last 6 months. I'm quite happy with the controls and the look and feel of the game. The game currently doesn't provide that much content yet, but I may update the game at some point.

Special thanks to Sandro Erhardt for making the awesome soundtrack. I also want to thank all of my friends that continuously test my games and always offer me support and great motivation!

Thank you for your feedback and support!

All rights reserved, please do not distribute this game without my permission.
